Talk103: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you very much! I'll restock soon.
Talk104:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... We're completely sold out at
the moment.<sp:5:1:0> But if you want to sell
something, I'm all ears!
Com_Talk_13: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>How many would you like to sell?
Talk105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Oh, I sell all sorts of things. Please don't
be shyâ€”have a look around!

Or will you sell something to me?
Talk106:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've got some wares that would be useful
for someone like you, Mr. Hero!

If you use a brightbloom seed in a dark
place, it'll light up the area. I bet you'd
find that handy, huh!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. I can't really do anything
with that...
Talk107:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>If there's anything you don't need, I'd be
happy to have a look at it.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Um. Can you remove the clothes you're
trying to sell me first, please?
Talk108:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>Thanks for letting me help you save
Hyrule, Mr. Hero!

I'll make sure to prepare a variety of
items again for next time.
Talk109:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>Thank you! I'm so glad I prepared a
variety of items!
Talk110:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>That's what I usually say, anyway, but
there's nothing here...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry... We're completely sold out
at the moment. But if you want to sell
something, let me know!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Looks like your pouch is full. I can buy
things from you if that helps free
up space.
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll take that off your hands.
Anything else?
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Let me know what you want to
sell, please.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>OK! What do you want to sell?
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you very much! Is there anything
else you want to sell?
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you very much. Would you like to
sell anything else?
Talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Notice_00>Well, look who we have here! Hello,
Mr. Hero, and welcome to the
General Shoppe!
Talk101:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Please buy whatever you want! Or do you
want to sell me something?
